name: Depths of the Earth
description:
Depths of the earth is a game about surviving and retrieving special crystals. You play as a android that has to go in the depths of a military bunker to retrieve alien energy crystals.
Complete each level before your battery dies. You are not armed. Use your memory to memorize the exit elevators. Various actions deplete your batteries faster.
Compatible with OUYA Controllers as well as other OUYA Everywhere controller sets.

Button config:
O – Run
U – Attack
A – Flashlight (Uses Batteries)

Support OUYA games!
